attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Being that interest rates are about to nose dive. The Prime Minister is petitioned to cut the savings tax rate taken from savers. Whilst realising the gravity of the UK situation it is very unfair that savers who rely on monthly interest are bearing the brunt.

This is not the same as http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Govt-Income/?signed=d82a429.4d90ed#detail

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
